name: BIOL 124
title: Optical Imaging for Biological Research
description: Covers the theory and application of light microscopy in a non-mathematical way. Course starts with basic optics, introduces the working principles of various microscopes, and discusses recent innovations in imaging techniques with an emphasis on neuroscience applications.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): PHYS 5B or PHYS 6B; and BIOL 110.
